iti68:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti68:2.1: “Whoever has not given up greed, hate, and delusion
iti68:2.2: is said to be trapped. They’re caught in Māra’s snare, and the Wicked One can do what he wants with them.
iti68:2.3: Whoever has given up greed, hate, and delusion
iti68:2.4: is said to be free. They’re caught in Māra’s snare, and the Wicked One can do what he wants with them.”
iti68:2.5: That is what the Buddha said.
iti68:3.1: “Those in whom greed, hate, and ignorance
iti68:3.3: belong with those who are evolved;
iti68:3.6: they’ve given up everything, they say.”
iti68:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
